title: Create API package
steps: create a typescript package inside a monorepo called @ralphban/api
install trpc
create basic setup for api definition
add just one router called kanban
router will have one query called getTasks

title: Use API package in server
steps: setup dependency on @ralphban/api in server package
install trpc server package in server package
provide implementation for the router in server package
getTasks will only return empty array for now

title: Use API package in web
steps: setup dependency on @ralphban/api in web package
install trpc (react) client package in web package
call getTasks query from web package

title: Remove every UI component from web package
steps: remove all UI components from the web package
keep the app empty and nothing should be rendered
Make sure trpc connection remains
remove all unusued code

title: Create ticket board UI with two columns: todo and done
steps: list all tasks from the api
based on a status keep it in the correct column
make sure UI is polling data for changes

title: Add button to start ralph
steps: add button to start ralph
make sure button is disabled when no tasks are ready
make sure button is enabled when tasks are ready
make sure button is disabled when ralph is running
